title: Brecon Beacons National Park
name: Pen Y Fan
directions: From Storey Arms on A470, an hours walk  along marked paths.
content: The highest peak in Southern Britain, at 2907 feet / 886 metres, is a popular walk for locals and visitors alike. Fantastic views, and an exhilarating walk. Can be included in a circular walk known as the horseshoe taking in the adjacent peaks of Cribyn and Corn Ddu.
